url.imageAlt: Mash Boardwalk / Pelee Wings at the Marsh

description: The Marsh boardwalk is a scenic walkway that allows visitors to explore the marshland ecosystem. It features interpretive signs about local biodiversity.
Pelee Wings at the Marsh offers a limited selection of gift shop items along with bike, canoe and kayak rentals. Inquire here about guided birding tours.
"Marsh Boardwalk and Canoe by Jason Zhang via Wikipedia Commons, licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. It shows the boardwalk winding through the marsh.
"Family Dinner" by Nikkiband via Wikipedia Commons, licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0. It depicts a family of Black Terns.
"Point Pelee Marsh" by Andrea via Flickr, licensed under CC BY-NC 2.0. It shows the boardwalk with a view of the marsh and surrounding vegetation.
